name: Add new Todoist events as rows in Google Sheets
description: Streamline your task management by automatically logging new events from Todoist into Google Sheets. With this template, every time you create a new event in Todoist, Make will instantly add a corresponding row in your Google Sheets, allowing you to keep track of your tasks and deadlines effortlessly. This integration enhances your productivity by ensuring that all your important events are documented in one accessible location for easy review and management.
